pluggable.name: Socialink
pluggable.author: ayunyan
pluggable.description: Adds social bookmark links to your posts

help.value:
Enabling this plugin will insert social bookmarking links (w/ associated icons) to and for every post. Readers may then click the links which will take them to the appropriate submission page for said entry.

While configuring: Top inserts the links on top of each post, Bottom on the bottom of each post, and None will not display the links (i.e., disable). Editing the theme is not required.
